700537f-a.title: Bronx: Boston Road - Tremont Avenue (East)
700537f-a.text:
2022 Boston Road, east side, between East Tremont Ave. and East
178th Street.
About 1925.
W. B. Vernam.
MAY BE REPRODUCED.
700537f-a.folder: Boston Road & Tremont Avenue (East), Bronx, NY

700924f-a.title: Bronx: Tremont Avenue (East - Boston Road
700924f-a.text:
E. Tremont Avenue, east from Boston Road. On the extreme
right is E. 177th Street, proceeding east from Devoe Avenue, and
to its left is Wyatt Street, running east from Devee Avenue. Alse
visible is the elevated structure of the New York, Boston and
Vestchester Railroad.
May 1926
Prown Brothers
NO REPRODUCTIONS
223  NVEG. A 209

700923f-a.title: Bronx: Tremont Avenue (East - Boston Road
700923f-a.text:
E. Tremont Avenue, south side (foregrouund ), east from Boston
Road to the Sronx River. Also shown is the New York Coliseumm, on
the south side of E. 177tth Street, adioininog Devoe Avenue. The view
is northeawtward from the E. 177t Street elevated station of the
I.R.T. subwav.
May 11, 1938.
P.L. Sperr
NO REEPRODUCTIOIIS.

700925f-a.title: Bronx: Tremont Avenue (East - Boston Road
700925f-a.text:
E. Tremont Avenue, north side, west from the Bronx River to
Boston Road. This is a central meeting point for a number of street
car lines of the Third Avenue Street Railway Comnany. Shown,too.
is the Tremont Avenue station of the I. R. T.
Jul. 23, 1940
L. Sperr
NO REPRODUCTIONS
